list.name: Default
list.comment:
Section 10 Lesson 124 - Checking if the user is already logged in +twitter_login() - checks to see if 'screen_name' exists in session, if it does, it goes directly to profile +homepage() - if session already exists, put in user name, else basic greeting
=have to modify the twitter utils file to return from website authentication. -should make an auto verification function in console version -need to clean up code

task.summary: Just a change of the page title

+Modified the search module to correct for searching by email, or id +Modified Menu.display_table_columns() to add a show=0 variable. show=0 (hide) show=1 (show column headers) This initializes the table before hand to avoid an error that I was getting after removing the column list Clean up some code and remove some commented code.

+Modified the search module to correct for searching by email, or id +Modified Menu.display_table_columns() to add a show=0 variable. show=0 (hide) show=1 (show column headers) This initializes the table before hand to avoid an error that I was getting after removing the column list Clean up some code and remove some commented code.

+Modified the search module to correct for searching by email, or id +Modified Menu.display_table_columns() to add a show=0 variable. show=0 (hide) show=1 (show column headers) This initializes the table before hand to avoid an error that I was getting after removing the column list Clean up some code and remove some commented code.

Section 10 Lesson 120 app_flask.py +added app.secret_key for the session['request_token'] +added app.route('/login/twitter') +session['request_token'] to story request token for return of user
+returns redirection to the twitter authorization url using request token
twitter_utils.py +get_oauth_verifier_url(request_token) - return the address for the twitter verifier webpage. +get_oauth_verifier(request_token) - modified to accept value from get_oauth_verifier_url() user.py +tw_request - cleaned up to accept different uri's

Section 10 Lesson 121 - Adding Twitter Authorization
+modified the app-flask to auto authenticate and save to the database =have to modify the twitter utils file to return from website authentication. -should make an auto verification function -need to clean up code

Section 10 Lesson 122 - Creating User Profile
+profile.html -created profile html file and passed variables to it using {{}} -passed user name and user email profile() -loads the user using session info incase we don't go via the login route. -if no user exists, redirects back to the /login/tritter page =have to modify the twitter utils file to return from website authentication. -should make an auto verification function in console version -need to clean up code

Section 10 Lesson 122 - Creating User Profile
+profile.html -created profile html file and passed variables to it using {{}} -passed user name and user email profile() -loads the user using session info incase we don't go via the login route. -if no user exists, redirects back to the /login/tritter page =have to modify the twitter utils file to return from website authentication. -should make an auto verification function in console version -need to clean up code

Section 10 Lesson 123 - Flask before_request Decorator +app.before_request -load_user() - loads the user if it exists in the session before everything
=have to modify the twitter utils file to return from website authentication. -should make an auto verification function in console version -need to clean up code

Section 10 Lesson 123 - Flask before_request Decorator +app.before_request -load_user() - loads the user if it exists in the session before everything
-logout() - clears the session and user has to login again.
=have to modify the twitter utils file to return from website authentication. -should make an auto verification function in console version -need to clean up code

MESSAGE.value: Just a change of the page title
